body_html: The workaround should be to install within a virtualenv. This workaround shouldn't be necessary. It might not work in all situations. I'd like to fix this. TensorBoard can't upgrade to the more recent versions of these libraries. However I vendor (or shade) them inside our pip package. Let me take a look into seeing what's possible.

body: The workaround should be to install within a virtualenv. This workaround shouldn't be necessary. It might not work in all situations. I'd like to fix this. TensorBoard can't upgrade to the more recent versions of these libraries. However I vendor (or shade) them inside our pip package. Let me take a look into seeing what's possible.
